feed.title: LogDevice Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest LogDevice news and events.

entry.title: Open-sourcing LogDevice, a distributed data store for sequential data
entry.summary:
We are excited to announce that today we are open-sourcing LogDevice! The code is now available on GitHub under the permissive 3-clause BSD license.

LogDevice is a distributed data store for sequential data originally developed within Facebook. This ...
